author: olegk
msg: Moved the default context initialization code to the DefaultHttpClient#createHttpContext method; replaced synchronized HttpContext impl with a non synchronized one: there is a new instance of HttpContext created for each request, there is no point to synchronize access to it

author: gertv
msg: SMX4-63: SMX4 stalls when running on Linux -- deadlocked

author: nandana
msg: RAMPART-186 Added a parameter map to STSClient so we can keep parameters there and set them once Axis service is created.
Made sure that we set the original exception when throwing exception
